javadoc:
Loads and Save a list of ColumnTableFilters for a specific table to the tool
@param <R> the row type of the table.

methods.name: <init>

methods.javadoc:
Adds a new ColumnTableFilter to be saved.
@param filter The filter to be saved.
methods.name: addFilter
methods.comment: Adds a new ColumnTableFilter to be saved.

methods.javadoc:
Deletes a ColumnTableFilter from the list of saved filters.
@param filter the filter to remove from the list of saved filters.
methods.name: removeFilter
methods.comment: Deletes a ColumnTableFilter from the list of saved filters.

params.name: filter
params.comment: the filter to remove from the list of saved filters.

methods.javadoc: Saves the list of filters to the tool's preference state.
methods.name: save
methods.comment: Saves the list of filters to the tool's preference state.

methods.javadoc:
Returns a list of the saved ColumnTableFilters
@return a list of the saved ColumnTableFilters
methods.name: getSavedFilters
methods.comment: Returns a list of the saved ColumnTableFilters

return.comment: a list of the saved ColumnTableFilters

methods.name: containsFilterWithName
methods.comment: Returns true if this save manager contains any filters with the given name.

params.name: name
params.comment: the name to check for a filter's existence.

return.comment: true if this save manager contains any filters with the given name.

name: ColumnFilterSaveManager
comment: Loads and Save a list of ColumnTableFilters for a specific table to the tool
